P01V285_2J.txt - 106.25MHz Engine speed
For iXon TX285 MAch1 Camera

Horizontal readout speeds implemented:
	35MHz 	(35.41)
	27MHz 	(26.56)
	13MHz 	(13.28)
	5MHz   	( 5.31)

Histroy:
	R2 mark space changed at 35MHz
	Moved CDS back one line at 35MHz
	Reduced width of CDS signal at 27MHz and 13MHz 
	Re-added PIXCLK pattern to correct ADC pipline delay problem - 29/06/04
	Corrected H binning - D.McKee 29/06/04 
	Added LOCK signal on bit 40 to sync TX_CLK - D.McKee 17/06/04
	Vertcal pattern adjusted to make ODB 12 lines
	

Vertical clocks need to be in groups of 12 lines to ensure engine clock phase and tx_clk
remain in sync at highest speeds of 2, 3 and 4 lines per horizontal pattern.

00000000	11111100	22221111	33222222	33333333	44444444
76543210	54321098	32109876	10987654	98765432	76543210

SSIBSSSS 	I-----R- 	----A--- 	C-- R--- 	--F----F 	A-ROC-PL
122 PPPP     	1     S  	    M    	M   1    	  I    R 	D 2DD XO
    3210     	      T  	    P    	G        	  R    A 	C  BS LC
<VS-st>
01100000	10000010	00000000	00001001	00000000	00001000
01100000	10000010	00000000	00001001	00000000	00001000
01100000	10000010	00000000	00001001	00000000	00001000
00100000	10000010	00000000	00001001	00000000	00001000
00100000	10000010	00000000	00001001	00000000	00001000
00100000	10000010	00000000	00001001	00000000	00001000
10100000	10000010	00000000	00001001	00000000	00001000
10100000	10000010	00000000	00001001	00000000	00001000
10100000	10000010	00000000	00001001	00000000	00001000
11100000	10000010	00000000	00001001	00000000	00001000
11100000	10000010	00000000	00001001	00000000	00001000
11110000	10000010	00000000	00001001	00000000	00001000
<\VS-st>

* Now Driving horizontal clocks during VS-st to improve baseline curl with clamp on *
<VS-sth>
01100000	10000000	00000000	10000001	00000000	00101000
01100000	10000010	00000000	00001001	00000000	00001000
01100000	10000000	00000000	10000001	00000000	00101000
00100000	10000010	00000000	00001001	00000000	00001000
00100000	10000000	00000000	10000001	00000000	00101000
00100000	10000010	00000000	00001001	00000000	00001000
10100000	10000000	00000000	10000001	00000000	00101000

10100000	10000000	00000000	10000001	00000000	00101000
11100000	10000010	00000000	00001001	00000000	00001000
11100000	10000000	00000000	10000001	00000000	00101000
11110000	10000010	00000000	00001001	00000000	00001000
<\VS-sth>

<VS-all>
01100000	00000010	00000000	00001001	00000000	00001000

01100000	00000010	00000000	00001001	00000000	00001000
00000000	00000010	00000000	00001001	00000000	00001000

    3210     	      T  	    P    	G        	  R    A 	C  BS L
<HS2J35>
11100000	11101110	00000000	00001001	00000000	00000000

<\HS2J35>

11100101	11101110	00000000	00001001	00000000	00000000
11100101	11101100	00001000	10000001	00000000	00101000

<\HS-EXP2J35>

<\EXP-NOHS2J35>
